siteConfig.tagline: Raising beautiful, healthy cats with love
siteConfig.introText: Welcome to My Cattery, where we raise happy, healthy cats in a loving home environment. Each of our cats is treated as family, with top-quality care, regular veterinary checkups, and plenty of socialization. We are passionate about the breeds we work with and strive to produce kittens with wonderful temperaments.

heroImages.alt: Beautiful cat relaxing in a sunny room
Elegant cat posing on a cozy blanket

cats.name: Mochi
cats.notes: Likes to sleep on the keyboard while you work

cats.name: Sakura
cats.notes: Expecting litter in June 2026. Will pick the friendliest kitten.
